name: dbgate
description: DbGate is a modern database management tool with a web-based IDE for SQL, JSON, and CSV. It supports many database types like PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, and SQLite. Easy to deploy in Docker for self-hosting.
features: Multi-Database Support: Connect to PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, SQLite, and more. Universal compatibility.
Web-Based IDE: Full-featured SQL editor in your browser. Code anywhere, anytime.
Data Export: Export to JSON, CSV, and other formats easily. Flexible data handling.
Query Builder: Visual tools for building complex queries. No SQL expertise required.
Schema Management: View and modify database structures visually. Intuitive database design.
Self-Hosted: Run your database management tool privately. Complete control and security.
